testcase.classname: Login functionality for opencart E-commerce application
testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid or empty credentials - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the opencart login page.......................................passed Given I have entered a invalid "ui23@gmail.com" and "validass"..............passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then I should see error message indicating "Warning: No match for E-Mail Address and/or Password.".passed

testcase.classname: Login functionality for opencart E-commerce application
testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid or empty credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the opencart login page.......................................passed Given I have entered a invalid "12^gmail78.com" and "invalidpassword".......passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then I should see error message indicating "Warning: No match for E-Mail Address and/or Password.".passed

testcase.classname: Login functionality for opencart E-commerce application
testcase.name: Navigating to forgotten password page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the opencart login page.......................................passed When I click on forgot password link........................................passed Then I should be navigated to password reset page...........................passed

testcase.classname: Login functionality for opencart E-commerce application
testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the opencart login page.......................................passed Given I have entered valid username and password............................passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then Login should be successful.............................................passed
